alluxio.master.file

Class FileSystemMaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • alluxio.master.AbstractMaster
      • alluxio.master.file.FileSystemMaster
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JournalCheckpointStreamable, Master

    @NotThreadSafe
public final class FileSystemMaster
extends AbstractMaster
    The master that handles all file system metadata management.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Class that contains metrics for FileSystemMaster.

      • processJournalEntry

        public void processJournalEntry(Journal.JournalEntry entry)
                         throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: Master
        Processes a journal entry and applies it to the master. These entries follow the checkpoint entries.
        Parameters:
        entry - the entry to process to update the state of the master
        Throws:
        IOException - if I/O error occurs

      • streamToJournalCheckpoint

        public void streamToJournalCheckpoint(JournalOutputStream outputStream)
                               throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: JournalCheckpointStreamable
        Writes to the journal, in a streaming fashion, via the JournalOutputStream.
        Parameters:
        outputStream - the output stream to write to for the journal checkpoint
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • start

        public void start(boolean isLeader)
           throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: Master
        Starts the master, as the leader master or the standby master. Here, the master should initialize state and possibly start threads required for operation. If isLeader is true, the master should also initialize the journal and write the checkpoint file.
        Specified by:
        start in interface Master
        Overrides:
        start in class AbstractMaster
        Parameters:
        isLeader - if true, the master should behave as the leader master in the system. If false, the master should act as a standby master.
        Throws:
        IOException - if I/O error occurs

      • getFileId

        public long getFileId(AlluxioURI path)
               throws AccessControlException
        Returns the file id for a given path. If the given path does not exist in Alluxio, the method attempts to load it from UFS.

        This operation requires users to have Mode.Bits#READ permission of the path.

        Parameters:
        path - the path to get the file id for
        Returns:
        the file id for a given path, or -1 if there is no file at that path
        Throws:
        AccessControlException - if permission checking fails

      • getFileInfo

        public FileInfo getFileInfo(long fileId)
                     throws FileDoesNotExistException
        Returns the FileInfo for a given file id. This method is not user-facing but supposed to be called by other internal servers (e.g., block workers and web UI servers).
        Parameters:
        fileId - the file id to get the FileInfo for
        Returns:
        the FileInfo for the given file
        Throws:
        FileDoesNotExistException - if the file does not exist

      • getFileInfo

        public FileInfo getFileInfo(AlluxioURI path)
                     throws FileDoesNotExistException,
                            InvalidPathException,
                            AccessControlException
        Returns the FileInfo for a given path.

        This operation requires users to have Mode.Bits#READ permission on the path.

        Parameters:
        path - the path to get the FileInfo for
        Returns:
        the FileInfo for the given file id
        Throws:
        FileDoesNotExistException - if the file does not exist
        InvalidPathException - if the file path is not valid
        AccessControlException - if permission checking fails

      • getPersistenceState

        public PersistenceState getPersistenceState(long fileId)
                                     throws FileDoesNotExistException
        Parameters:
        fileId - the file id
        Returns:
        the persistence state for the given file
        Throws:
        FileDoesNotExistException - if the file does not exist

      • listStatus

        public List<FileInfo> listStatus(AlluxioURI path,
                                 ListStatusOptions listStatusOptions)
                          throws AccessControlException,
                                 FileDoesNotExistException,
                                 InvalidPathException
        Returns a list of FileInfo for a given path. If the given path is a file, the list only contains a single object. If it is a directory, the resulting list contains all direct children of the directory.

        This operation requires users to have Mode.Bits#READ permission on the path, and also Mode.Bits#EXECUTE permission on the path if it is a directory.

        Parameters:
        path - the path to get the FileInfo list for
        listStatusOptions - the ListStatusOptions
        Returns:
        the list of FileInfos
        Throws:
        AccessControlException - if permission checking fails
        FileDoesNotExistException - if the file does not exist
        InvalidPathException - if the path is invalid

      • getFileSystemMasterView

        public FileSystemMasterView getFileSystemMasterView()
        Returns:
        a read-only view of the file system master

      • completeFile

        public void completeFile(AlluxioURI path,
                         CompleteFileOptions options)
                  throws BlockInfoException,
                         FileDoesNotExistException,
                         InvalidPathException,
                         InvalidFileSizeException,
                         FileAlreadyCompletedException,
                         AccessControlException
        Completes a file. After a file is completed, it cannot be written to.

        This operation requires users to have Mode.Bits#WRITE permission on the path.

        Parameters:
        path - the file path to complete
        options - the method options
        Throws:
        BlockInfoException - if a block information exception is encountered
        FileDoesNotExistException - if the file does not exist
        InvalidPathException - if an invalid path is encountered
        InvalidFileSizeException - if an invalid file size is encountered
        FileAlreadyCompletedException - if the file is already completed
        AccessControlException - if permission checking fails

      • createFile

        public long createFile(AlluxioURI path,
                       CreateFileOptions options)
                throws AccessControlException,
                       InvalidPathException,
                       FileAlreadyExistsException,
                       BlockInfoException,
                       IOException,
                       FileDoesNotExistException
        Creates a file (not a directory) for a given path.

        This operation requires Mode.Bits#WRITE permission on the parent of this path.

        Parameters:
        path - the file to create
        options - method options
        Returns:
        the file id of the create file
        Throws:
        InvalidPathException - if an invalid path is encountered
        FileAlreadyExistsException - if the file already exists
        BlockInfoException - if an invalid block information is encountered
        IOException - if the creation fails
        AccessControlException - if permission checking fails
        FileDoesNotExistException - if the parent of the path does not exist and the recursive option is false

      • reinitializeFile

        public long reinitializeFile(AlluxioURI path,
                             long blockSizeBytes,
                             long ttl)
                      throws InvalidPathException,
                             FileDoesNotExistException
        Reinitializes the blocks of an existing open file.
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the file
        blockSizeBytes - the new block size
        ttl - the ttl
        Returns:
        the file id
        Throws:
        InvalidPathException - if the path is invalid
        FileDoesNotExistException - if the path does not exist

      • getNewBlockIdForFile

        public long getNewBlockIdForFile(AlluxioURI path)
                          throws FileDoesNotExistException,
                                 InvalidPathException,
                                 AccessControlException
        Gets a new block id for the next block of a given file to write to.

        This operation requires users to have Mode.Bits#WRITE permission on the path as this API is called when creating a new block for a file.

        Parameters:
        path - the path of the file to get the next block id for
        Returns:
        the next block id for the given file
        Throws:
        FileDoesNotExistException - if the file does not exist
        InvalidPathException - if the given path is not valid
        AccessControlException - if permission checking fails

      • getMountTable

        public Map<String,MountInfo> getMountTable()
        Returns:
        a copy of the current mount table

      • getNumberOfPaths

        public int getNumberOfPaths()
        Returns:
        the number of files and directories

      • getNumberOfPinnedFiles

        public int getNumberOfPinnedFiles()
        Returns:
        the number of pinned files and directories

      • delete

        public void delete(AlluxioURI path,
                   boolean recursive)
            throws IOException,
                   FileDoesNotExistException,
                   DirectoryNotEmptyException,
                   InvalidPathException,
                   AccessControlException
        Deletes a given path.

        This operation requires user to have Mode.Bits#WRITE permission on the parent of the path.

        Parameters:
        path - the path to delete
        recursive - if true, will delete all its children
        Throws:
        DirectoryNotEmptyException - if recursive is false and the file is a nonempty directory
        FileDoesNotExistException - if the file does not exist
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs
        AccessControlException - if permission checking fails
        InvalidPathException - if the path is invalid

      • getFileBlockInfoList

        public List<FileBlockInfo> getFileBlockInfoList(AlluxioURI path)
                                         throws FileDoesNotExistException,
                                                InvalidPathException,
                                                AccessControlException
        Gets the FileBlockInfo for all blocks of a file. If path is a directory, an exception is thrown.

        This operation requires the client user to have Mode.Bits#READ permission on the the path.

        Parameters:
        path - the path to get the info for
        Returns:
        a list of FileBlockInfo for all the blocks of the given path
        Throws:
        FileDoesNotExistException - if the file does not exist or path is a directory
        InvalidPathException - if the path of the given file is invalid
        AccessControlException - if permission checking fails

      • getInMemoryFiles

        public List<AlluxioURI> getInMemoryFiles()
        Returns:
        absolute paths of all in memory files

      • createDirectory

        public void createDirectory(AlluxioURI path,
                            CreateDirectoryOptions options)
                     throws InvalidPathException,
                            FileAlreadyExistsException,
                            IOException,
                            AccessControlException,
                            FileDoesNotExistException
        Creates a directory for a given path.

        This operation requires the client user to have Mode.Bits#WRITE permission on the parent of the path.

        Parameters:
        path - the path of the directory
        options - method options
        Throws:
        InvalidPathException - when the path is invalid, please see documentation on InodeTree.createPath(LockedInodePath, CreatePathOptions) for more details
        FileAlreadyExistsException - when there is already a file at path
        IOException - if a non-Alluxio related exception occurs
        AccessControlException - if permission checking fails
        FileDoesNotExistException - if the parent of the path does not exist and the recursive option is false

      • rename

        public void rename(AlluxioURI srcPath,
                   AlluxioURI dstPath)
            throws FileAlreadyExistsException,
                   FileDoesNotExistException,
                   InvalidPathException,
                   IOException,
                   AccessControlException
        Renames a file to a destination.

        This operation requires users to have Mode.Bits#WRITE permission on the parent of the src path, and Mode.Bits#WRITE permission on the parent of the dst path.

        Parameters:
        srcPath - the source path to rename
        dstPath - the destination path to rename the file to
        Throws:
        FileDoesNotExistException - if a non-existent file is encountered
        InvalidPathException - if an invalid path is encountered
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs
        AccessControlException - if permission checking fails
        FileAlreadyExistsException - if the file already exists

      • free

        public boolean free(AlluxioURI path,
                    boolean recursive)
             throws FileDoesNotExistException,
                    InvalidPathException,
                    AccessControlException
        Frees or evicts all of the blocks of the file from alluxio storage. If the given file is a directory, and the 'recursive' flag is enabled, all descendant files will also be freed.

        This operation requires users to have Mode.Bits#READ permission on the path.

        Parameters:
        path - the path to free
        recursive - if true, and the file is a directory, all descendants will be freed
        Returns:
        true if the file was freed
        Throws:
        FileDoesNotExistException - if the file does not exist
        AccessControlException - if permission checking fails
        InvalidPathException - if the given path is invalid

      • getPath

        public AlluxioURI getPath(long fileId)
                   throws FileDoesNotExistException
        Gets the path of a file with the given id.
        Parameters:
        fileId - the id of the file to look up
        Returns:
        the path of the file
        Throws:
        FileDoesNotExistException - raise if the file does not exist

      • getPinIdList

        public Set<Long> getPinIdList()
        Returns:
        the set of inode ids which are pinned

      • getUfsAddress

        public String getUfsAddress()
        Returns:
        the ufs address for this master

      • getWhiteList

        public List<String> getWhiteList()
        Returns:
        the white list

      • getLostFiles

        public List<Long> getLostFiles()
        Returns:
        all the files lost on the workers

      • reportLostFile

        public void reportLostFile(long fileId)
                    throws FileDoesNotExistException
        Reports a file as lost.
        Parameters:
        fileId - the id of the file
        Throws:
        FileDoesNotExistException - if the file does not exist

      • loadMetadata

        public long loadMetadata(AlluxioURI path,
                         LoadMetadataOptions options)
                  throws BlockInfoException,
                         FileDoesNotExistException,
                         InvalidPathException,
                         InvalidFileSizeException,
                         FileAlreadyCompletedException,
                         IOException,
                         AccessControlException
        Loads metadata for the object identified by the given path from UFS into Alluxio.

        This operation requires users to have Mode.Bits#WRITE permission on the path and its parent path if path is a file, or Mode.Bits#WRITE permission on the parent path if path is a directory.

        Parameters:
        path - the path for which metadata should be loaded
        options - the load metadata options
        Returns:
        the file id of the loaded path
        Throws:
        BlockInfoException - if an invalid block size is encountered
        FileDoesNotExistException - if there is no UFS path
        InvalidPathException - if invalid path is encountered
        InvalidFileSizeException - if invalid file size is encountered
        FileAlreadyCompletedException - if the file is already completed
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs
        AccessControlException - if permission checking fails

      • mount

        public void mount(AlluxioURI alluxioPath,
                  AlluxioURI ufsPath,
                  MountOptions options)
           throws FileAlreadyExistsException,
                  FileDoesNotExistException,
                  InvalidPathException,
                  IOException,
                  AccessControlException
        Mounts a UFS path onto an Alluxio path.

        This operation requires users to have Mode.Bits#WRITE permission on the parent of the Alluxio path.

        Parameters:
        alluxioPath - the Alluxio path to mount to
        ufsPath - the UFS path to mount
        options - the mount options
        Throws:
        FileAlreadyExistsException - if the path to be mounted to already exists
        FileDoesNotExistException - if the parent of the path to be mounted to does not exist
        InvalidPathException - if an invalid path is encountered
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs
        AccessControlException - if the permission check fails

      • unmount

        public boolean unmount(AlluxioURI alluxioPath)
                throws FileDoesNotExistException,
                       InvalidPathException,
                       IOException,
                       AccessControlException
        Unmounts a UFS path previously mounted onto an Alluxio path.

        This operation requires users to have Mode.Bits#WRITE permission on the parent of the Alluxio path.

        Parameters:
        alluxioPath - the Alluxio path to unmount, must be a mount point
        Returns:
        true if the UFS path was successfully unmounted, false otherwise
        Throws:
        FileDoesNotExistException - if the path to be mounted does not exist
        InvalidPathException - if an invalid path is encountered
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs
        AccessControlException - if the permission check fails

      • resetFile

        public void resetFile(long fileId)
               throws FileDoesNotExistException,
                      InvalidPathException,
                      AccessControlException
        Resets a file. It first free the whole file, and then reinitializes it.
        Parameters:
        fileId - the id of the file
        Throws:
        FileDoesNotExistException - if the file does not exist
        AccessControlException - if permission checking fails
        InvalidPathException - if the path is invalid for the id of the file

      • setAttribute

        public void setAttribute(AlluxioURI path,
                         SetAttributeOptions options)
                  throws FileDoesNotExistException,
                         AccessControlException,
                         InvalidPathException
        Sets the file attribute.

        This operation requires users to have Mode.Bits#WRITE permission on the path. In addition, the client user must be a super user when setting the owner, and must be a super user or the owner when setting the group or permission.

        Parameters:
        path - the path to set attribute for
        options - attributes to be set, see SetAttributeOptions
        Throws:
        FileDoesNotExistException - if the file does not exist
        AccessControlException - if permission checking fails
        InvalidPathException - if the given path is invalid

      • scheduleAsyncPersistence

        public void scheduleAsyncPersistence(AlluxioURI path)
                              throws AlluxioException
        Schedules a file for async persistence.
        Parameters:
        path - the path of the file for persistence
        Throws:
        AlluxioException - if scheduling fails

      • workerHeartbeat

        public FileSystemCommand workerHeartbeat(long workerId,
                                         List<Long> persistedFiles)
                                  throws FileDoesNotExistException,
                                         InvalidPathException,
                                         AccessControlException
        Instructs a worker to persist the files.

        Needs Mode.Bits#WRITE permission on the list of files.

        Parameters:
        workerId - the id of the worker that heartbeats
        persistedFiles - the files that persisted on the worker
        Returns:
        the command for persisting the blocks of a file
        Throws:
        FileDoesNotExistException - if the file does not exist
        InvalidPathException - if the file path corresponding to the file id is invalid
        AccessControlException - if permission checking fails

      • getWorkerInfoList

        public List<WorkerInfo> getWorkerInfoList()
        Returns:
        a list of WorkerInfo objects representing the workers in Alluxio
